short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will convert any instance of 'Donald Trump' to 'His Royal Duke of Douchiness' and  'Trump' to 'Doucheface'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app was made for those who are sick of seeing Donald Trump's name in their newsfeed and in the headlines.  For people who prefer to see him labeled in a far more appropriate way.
